articles.description: Lo, a solo developer is launching the first version of The Bible to grace Valve's Steam storefront on November 14th.
articles.content: It’s nearly the end of the year, a time when many a person's thoughts turn to the birth of Jesus Christ (along with whether or not they’re getting FIFA 23 on Christmas morning). Forget about other ga… [+1490 chars]
